text: "Impossible to Fly" is a song by Australian rock band Baby Animals. It was released in November 1992. It was the first new music from the band since the release of the multi-platinum selling debut studio album, Baby Animals (1991). The song peaked at number 48 on the ARIA Chart. ==Track listings== Australian CD single (25022) # "Impossible to Fly" – 3:15 # "Waste of Time" (Live) – 5:03 # "Big Time Friends" (Live) – 6:25 # "Impossible to Fly" (Live) – 3:57 * Live tracks recorded at Newcastle Civic Theatre, New South Wales in June 1992. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !
